hadiths.text: Urwa b. Zubair reported:'A'isha asked: What disrupts the prayer? We said: The woman and the ass. Upon this she remarked: Is the woman an ugly animal? I lay in front of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) like the bier of a corpse and he said prayer

chapter.eng-name: Lying In Front Of One Who Is Praying
